item.title: Azure Flow Log Analysis
item.description: Intro Disclaimer I currently work at Snowflake and use the product on a daily basis for log analysis and threat detection. At the time of this writing, that probably adds bias to my article. At Snowflake, we’re a multi-cloud environment. As part of the threat detection team, it’s my job to ensure that we’re monitoring. One of my tasks was to monitor our Azure flow logs for unusual behavior. Information on Azure Network Security Group (NSG) flow logs can be found at this link.
